channel.title: Version 5.16 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 5.16.2 (2023-06-10) Enhancements [feature] theme: revamp 404 plank #566 5.16.1 (2023-06-09) Enhancements [feature] theme: add deprecat'n warnings #565 Fixes [bug] mermaid: allow fer YAML frontmatter inside o' graph #564 [bug] alias: fix redirect URLs 'n case o' empty BaseURL #562 5.16.0 (2023-06-08) Enhancements [feature] tabs: add title an' ay'con opt'n #552 [feature] shorrrtcodes: add style opt'n t' mimic code box color scheme #551 [feature] tabs: support color opt'ns #550 [feature] favicon: add light & dark opt'n fer OS’s preferred color scheme #549 Fixes [bug] ay'con: remove whitespace on start #560 [bug] shorrrtcodes: avoid superflous margin at start an' end o' rrrambl'n #558 [bug] expand: fix html encod'n o' finish'n rrrambl'n tag #557 [bug] ay'con: fix ouput “raw HTML omitted” wit' goldmark config unsafe=false #555
